constituent: hold, finger, fingers, Buddhist temple, soil, dirt, ground, glue
koohiiStory1: At the BUDDHIST TEMPLE you´ll see wonderous things, such as the priest that can HOLD himself upside down with just a FINGER.
koohiiStory2: In Kyaiktiyo, there is rocking stone which sits on the edge of a cliff, and there is a Buddhist temple built on the top of it. You can rock the stone by pushing it with your finger, but it still holds in place. It´s true, see here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kyaiktiyo.
words: hold, charge, keep possession, in charge, wear, durability, life, draw, usage (suff)
hot topic, talk of the town
to be well liked, to be popular
